name: Where is my 2nd dimension, gentlemen?
description:
During one beautiful winter day in England our dearest Sir Reginald decided to go out for picnic, but he was unfortunately caught off guard by a sudden blizzard. He was also separated from his tea set for a period of time, which is a terrible tragedy. As it is commonly known,  the British cannot exist in our reality without a tea for too long, and so Sir Reginald soon lost his ability to travel in more than one dimension. Please, guide our beloved Sir Reginald safely to his tea.

P.S. If you want to play game in fullscreen, then use combination alt + enter. 

Have a good day, everyone! 

Big thanks to:

  • Kevin McLeod and FreePD.com for free musical composition "Infinite Peace".
  • Shaun Spalding for his lessons in Gamemaker Studio 2 and tileset that I modified and used as a foreground.
  • Game Maker's Toolkit and itch.io for organizing such an event.
